item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: I freakin' love "Wonder Showzen" - I'll have to check that one out. Just "let it go" KFL...just let it go.
item.content:encoded: I freakin’ love “Wonder Showzen” – I’ll have to check that one out. Just “let it go” KFL…just let it go.

item.title: By: Kevin Langston
item.dc:creator: Kevin Langston
item.description: You know me, and I hated <i>The Letting Go</i>. OK, "hate" is a strong word, but I sold my copy because Dawn Whatshername ruined it for me.
item.content:encoded: You know me, and I hated The Letting Go. OK, “hate” is a strong word, but I sold my copy because Dawn Whatshername ruined it for me.

item.title: By: Adam O
item.dc:creator: Adam O
item.description: Don't forget his "hilarious" guest appearance on the MTV2 show "Wonder Showzen" telling fart jokes with David Cross. But hey, he's made more than enough great music in my fair opinion for me to forgive him these multiple, er, transgressions. I mean, if a Henry Rollins fan can forgive ol' No-Neck for playing Vanilla Ice in a hip-hop video and appearing in crap like The Getaway, surely Willie can get a few free passes, right?
item.content:encoded:
Don’t forget his “hilarious” guest appearance on
the MTV2 show “Wonder Showzen” telling
fart jokes with David Cross. But hey, he’s made
more than enough great music in my fair opinion
for me to forgive him these multiple, er, transgressions. I mean, if a Henry Rollins fan
can forgive ol’ No-Neck for playing Vanilla Ice in a hip-hop video and appearing in crap like The Getaway, surely Willie can get a few free passes, right?
